caption.p: Identification of tumor antigens associated with PAAD prognosis. a) Potential tumor antigens (total 926) with high expression and mutation in PAAD, and significant association with OS and RFS (total 7 candidates). b- g Kaplan-Meier curves showing OS of PAAD patients stratified on the basis of ( b) ADAM9, ( c) EFNB2, ( d) MET, ( e) TMOD3, ( f) TPX2 and ( g) WNT7A expression levels
